name: Sharks Dealer
description:
An unpolished demo testing out a couple of systems in 3D.

  • Picking up 
  • Buying
  • Reloading
  • Inventory
  • Destroying the crate

Use E to pick-up the coin from the vending machine & buy a gun from the Sharks Dealer.

Use the gun to destroy the crate.

Use R for Reload.

Need to fix:

  • Rays going through objects
  • Shooting without a gun
